item.description:
Fun, Fun, and More Fun!
Waterslides and Picnic

Come and have a blast with unlimited rides on the waterslides and swimming in the lake!

Bring food to share for a picnic. I'll bring papergoods (plates, forks, napkins).

Enjoy a great summer day before the summer is over!

Cost: $18 per person for the entire day - includes unlimited rides on waterslides

Cost: $8.50 for the park and swimming - no rides on the waterslides (for those who prefer not to go on the waterslides and just participate in the picnic and swimming)

Beer and wine is allowed, but no hard liquor
No pets of any kind are allowed

On the grounds are: bathrooms, changing rooms and a concession stand.


For more information visit: http://breezysummer.c...

Directions: http://breezysummer.c...

How to find us:
Meet 10 am at the entrance and we will buy our tickets together.
If you arrive after 10 am, get your ticket and meet us on the waterslides or look for the picnic table with the meetup sign.

Jacki's cell is: 508-381-1529
item.name: Waterslides and Picnic
